pageSubtitle: Record and export your state mileage for IFTA reporting
upgradeMessage: Upgrade to Premium to access state mileage tracking

featurePreview.title: What you'll get with State Mileage Tracker:
featurePreview.activeTripRecording: Active trip recording with state border crossings
featurePreview.exportData: Export trip data for quarterly IFTA filings
featurePreview.tripHistory: Trip history with date and odometer tracking

tripRecording.title: Trip Recording
tripRecording.description: Start active trips and record state crossings with odometer readings

stateCrossings.title: State Crossings
stateCrossings.description: Log when you cross state lines to track miles per jurisdiction

tripHistory.title: Trip History
tripHistory.description: View past trips and edit mileage entries as needed

iftaExport.title: IFTA Export
iftaExport.description: Export mileage data in IFTA-ready format for quarterly filings

tips: Start a trip before leaving and add state entries as you cross borders
Record odometer readings at each state line for accurate calculations
Use the IFTA Calculator to combine mileage with fuel data
Export your trip data before quarterly IFTA filing deadlines

activeTripRecording.title: Active Trip Recording
activeTripRecording.description: Add state crossings as you drive to automatically calculate miles by state.

stateByStateTracking.title: State-by-State Tracking
stateByStateTracking.description: Automatically calculate miles driven in each state based on your odometer readings.

iftaMileageReports.title: IFTA Mileage Reports
iftaMileageReports.description: Export your trip data in IFTA-compatible format for easy quarterly filings.

deleteModal.title: Delete Trip
deleteModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the trip with {{vehicleName}} from {{tripDate}}? This will permanently remove all state crossings and mileage data associated with this trip.
deleteModal.iftaWarningMessage: {{count}} IFTA record{{plural}} ({{miles}} miles) in {{quarters}} will also be removed from your IFTA calculator.

activeTrips.title: Active Trips
activeTrips.noTripsDescription: Start a new trip to track state mileage

selectPrompts.selectFromList: Please select one from the list on the left to view details or add state crossings.
selectPrompts.selectOrCreateDescription: To start tracking your state mileage, select an existing trip from the list or create a new one.

pastTrips.title: Completed Trips
pastTrips.noTripsDescription: Complete active trips to see history
pastTrips.noStateCrossings: No state crossings found for this trip
pastTrips.selectPastTripDescription: Select a completed trip from the list to view details and mileage breakdown.

summaryTab.title: Mileage Summary by State (All Time)
summaryTab.noDataDescription: Complete trips to see your mileage summary

export.failed: Failed to export mileage data. Please try again.

messages.tripCompleted: Trip completed successfully! You can now manually import it to your IFTA calculator.
messages.alreadyImported: This trip has already been imported to the IFTA calculator
messages.importSuccess: Successfully imported {{count}} state records to IFTA calculator
messages.importSuccessQuarters: Successfully imported {{count}} state records to IFTA calculator for {{quarter}}
messages.importSuccessMultiQuarters: Successfully imported {{count}} state records to IFTA calculator (split across {{quarters}})
